entity.name: org.openflexo.foundation.FlexoModelObject

property.name: userIdentifier
property.description: Unique ID of the user (used for team synchronization)

property.name: flexoID
property.description: Unique ID generated and maintained by Flexo

property.name: dontGenerate
property.description: Check this box, if you don't want this node to generate documentation

property.name: hasSpecificDescriptions
property.description: Wheter the specific descriptions should be used in the generated documentation or not

property.name: specificDescriptions
property.description: Hashtable(String,String) that contains a name of a DocType as a key, and a description specific to that DocType as the value

property.name: dynamicProperties
property.description: Hashtable(String,String) that contains dynamic properties (data that are not handled by application, but need to be stored in the context of back compatibility)

entity.description: Root class for all objects of Flexo

entity.name: org.openflexo.foundation.dm.DMObject
entity.description: Abstract representation of an object involved in data model definition

entity.name: org.openflexo.foundation.dm.DMModel
entity.description: Represents the whole data model for the project

property.name: projectRepositories
property.description: Contains the list of ProjetRepositories related to this project

property.name: projectDatabaseRepositories
property.description: Contains the list of ProjectDatabaseRepositories related to this project

property.name: externalRepositories
property.description: Contains the list of ExternalRepositories related to this project

property.name: denaliFoundationRepositories
property.description: Contains the list of DenaliFoundationRepositories related to this project

property.name: externalDatabaseRepositories
property.description: Contains the list of ExternalDatabaseRepositories related to this project

property.name: rationalRoseRepositories
property.description: Contains the list of RationalRoseRepositories related to this project

property.name: WSDLRepositories
property.description: Contains the list of WebService Repositories related to this project

property.name: XmlSchemaRepositories
property.description: Contains the list of Xml Schema based Repositories related to this project

property.name: thesaurusRepositories
property.description: Contains the list of ThesaurusRepositories related to this project

property.name: thesaurusDatabaseRepositories
property.description: Contains the list of ThesaurusDatabaseRepositories related to this project

entity.name: org.openflexo.foundation.dm.DMRepository
entity.description: Represents a logical group of DMEntity sharing the same implementation

property.name: entities
property.description: Contains the list of DMEntities this repository contains, stored in a hashtable where the key if the full-qualified name of the entity

entity.name: org.openflexo.foundation.dm.eo.DMEORepository
entity.description: Represents a database implementation for a group of objects stored in a list of DMEOModel

property.name: DMEOModels
property.description: Contains a list of DMEOModel, stored in a hashtable where the key if the full-qualified name of the EOModel

entity.name: org.openflexo.foundation.dm.eo.DMEOModel
entity.description: Represents a database implementation for a group of objects (maps an EOModel)

entity.name: org.openflexo.foundation.dm.DenaliFoundationRepository
entity.description: Represents a Denali library

entity.name: org.openflexo.foundation.dm.ExternalDatabaseRepository
entity.description: Represents a connexion to an already existing database (customer database for example)

entity.name: org.openflexo.foundation.dm.ProjectDatabaseRepository
entity.description: Represents a logical group of objects stored in a project database

entity.name: org.openflexo.foundation.dm.ThesaurusDatabaseRepository
entity.description: Represents a logical group of objects stored in a thesaurus database

entity.name: org.openflexo.foundation.dm.ComponentRepository
entity.description: Represents a logical group of objects representing components used in the context of the project

entity.name: org.openflexo.foundation.dm.ProcessInstanceRepository
entity.description: Represents a logical group of objects representing process instances used in the context of the project

entity.name: org.openflexo.foundation.dm.ExternalRepository
entity.description: Represents a logical group of objects stored in an external jar file

property.name: isImportedByUser
property.description: true if this jar is manually imported by user

entity.name: org.openflexo.foundation.dm.JDKRepository
entity.description: Represents a logical group of objects defined in common JDK implementation and used in the project

entity.name: org.openflexo.foundation.dm.eo.EOPrototypeRepository
entity.description: Stores all the EOPrototypes

entity.name: org.openflexo.foundation.dm.FlexoExecutionModelRepository
entity.description: Stores the execution model repository

entity.name: org.openflexo.foundation.dm.ProjectRepository
entity.description: Represents a logical group of objects stored in only memory: their persistence is not assumed by a relational database

entity.name: org.openflexo.foundation.dm.RationalRoseRepository
entity.description: Represents a logical group of objects extracted from a RationalRose file import

entity.name: org.openflexo.foundation.dm.WSDLRepository
entity.description: Represents a logical group of objects extracted from a WSDL file import

entity.name: org.openflexo.foundation.dm.XMLSchemaRepository
entity.description: Represents a logical group of objects extracted from a xml schema file

property.name: XMLSchemaFile
property.description: Name of related XML schema file

entity.name: org.openflexo.foundation.dm.ThesaurusRepository
entity.description: Represents a logical group of objects stored in a non-database thesaurus

entity.name: org.openflexo.foundation.dm.WORepository
entity.description: Represents a logical group of objects used for WO scheme: contains WebObjects common classes

entity.name: org.openflexo.foundation.dm.DMEntity
entity.description: Represents a class and its definition

property.name: typeVariables
property.description: Contains the list of type variable for this entity

property.name: properties
property.description: Contains the list of DMProperties attached to this entity, stored in a hashtable where the key if the name of the property

property.name: methods
property.description: Contains the list of DMMethods attached to this entity, stored in a hashtable where the key if the signature of the method

property.name: repository
property.description: Repository where this entity is declared

property.name: isReadOnly
property.description: When set to true, means that this entity could not be modified

property.name: lastUpdate
property.description: date used to perform fine tuning resource dependancies computing

property.name: isInterface
property.description: true if representing an Interface in Java

property.name: isEnumeration
property.description: true if representing an Enumeration in Java

property.name: declaredTranstypers
property.description: Contains the list of transtypers declared for this entity

entity.name: org.openflexo.foundation.dm.DMEntity$DMTypeVariable
entity.description: Represents a type variable related to an entity

entity.name: org.openflexo.foundation.dm.ComponentDMEntity
entity.description: Represents a component entity

property.name: mandatoryBindingProperties
property.description: Properties that are mandatory in the context of related component bindings

property.name: settableBindingProperties
property.description: Properties that are mandatory in the context of related component bindings

entity.name: org.openflexo.foundation.dm.ProcessDMEntity
entity.description: Represents a component entity

entity.name: org.openflexo.foundation.dm.LoadableDMEntity
entity.description: Represents a class and its definition which is present in the class loader

entity.name: org.openflexo.foundation.dm.JDKPrimitive
entity.description: Represents a class and its definition which is present in the class loader

entity.name: org.openflexo.foundation.dm.eo.DMEOEntity
entity.description: Represents a class and its definition for objects stored in database

property.name: DMEOModel
property.description: DMEOModel where this entity is registered

entity.name: org.openflexo.foundation.dm.DMProperty
entity.description: Represents an accessor as a get/set key-value pair

property.name: cardinality
property.description: Kind of cardinality (SINGLE, VECTOR, HASHTABLE, ARRAY)

property.name: isReadOnly
property.description: When set to true, means that this property cannot be modified

property.name: isSettable
property.description: When set to false, means that this property can only be read

property.name: isStaticallyDefinedInTemplate
property.description: Flag indicating if method was statically defined in template while performing last model reinjection

property.name: keyType
property.description: Target type used as a key is cardinality of this property is hashtable

property.name: isUnderscoredAccessors
property.description: True if underscore is to prepend to accessor names

entity.name: org.openflexo.foundation.dm.eo.DMEOProperty
entity.description: Represents an accessor as a get/set key-value pair mapping a data stored in a database

property.name: columnName
property.description: Name of column in related table

entity.name: org.openflexo.foundation.dm.eo.DMEOAttribute
entity.description: Represents an accessor implemented as an attribute (field in a DB table)

entity.name: org.openflexo.foundation.dm.eo.DMEOPrototype
entity.description: Represents an EO Prototype

entity.name: org.openflexo.foundation.dm.eo.DMEORelationship
entity.description: Represents an accessor implemented as a relationship (relationship between DB tables)

entity.name: org.openflexo.foundation.dm.DMMethod
entity.description: Represents a method attached to an entity

property.name: parameters
property.description: Contains the list of parameters for this method

property.name: isStaticallyDefinedInTemplate
property.description: Flag indicating if method was statically defined in template while performing last model reinjection

entity.name: org.openflexo.foundation.dm.DMMethod$DMMethodParameter
entity.description: Represents a parameter of a method attached to an entity

entity.name: org.openflexo.foundation.dm.DMTranstyper
entity.description: Represents a transtyper

property.name: entries
property.description: Contains the list of entries declared for this transtyper

property.name: values
property.description: Contains the list of values declared as mapping for this transtyper

entity.name: org.openflexo.foundation.dm.DMTranstyper$DMTranstyperEntry
entity.description: Represents a transtyper entry

entity.name: org.openflexo.foundation.dm.DMTranstyper$DMTranstyperValue
entity.description: Represents a transtyper value
